app.title: Will AI Replace Me? Yes, but not yet
app.description: Explore how AI is changing specific tasks within professions. No clickbait, no panic—just task-level analysis of what's changing and what stays human.

hero.heading: Yes, but... not yet
hero.subheading: AI won't replace your job. It will change how you do it.
hero.description: We analyze professions task by task—no binary answers, no doom predictions. Discover which parts of your work are shifting and which remain uniquely human.

taskLevel.title: Task-Level Analysis
taskLevel.description: We break down each profession into 18+ specific tasks, analyzing automation potential for each one individually.

noHype.title: No Hype, No Panic
noHype.description: Based on credible sources like BLS, O*NET, WHO, and NIST. No sensational predictions—just grounded analysis.

actionable.title: Actionable Strategies
actionable.description: Each profession includes concrete adaptation strategies for 2 weeks, 2 months, and 2 quarters.

about.title: Why "Yes, but... not yet"?
about.p1: Headlines love binary answers: "AI WILL replace doctors!" or "AI will NEVER replace teachers!" Reality is messier and more interesting.
about.p2: Every profession is a bundle of tasks. Some tasks are highly automatable today. Others require judgment, empathy, creativity, or physical presence that current AI can't match.
about.p3: Our analysis focuses on this nuance: which specific tasks are changing, on what timeline, and what stays uniquely human.

tasks.title: Task Analysis
tasks.subtitle: How automation impacts specific tasks
tasks.noResults: No tasks match the selected filters

offline.title: You're Offline
offline.description: It looks like you've lost your internet connection. Some features may be limited.

notFound.title: Profession Not Found
notFound.description: We couldn't find the profession you're looking for.
